author.name: Bryan Berry - Nathen Harvey - Matt Ray

entry.title: Best Practices with Chef
entry.content:
Join Us!

Join us on Thursday, December 5, 2013 19:00 UTC for episode 69, Best Practices with Chef.

We've started an outline of the show and would love to see your pull requests for additional topics to discuss.

Watch Now

The show will begin on Thursday, December 5, 2013 19:00 UTC.

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download
    • Audio - Coming soon!
    • Video - Begins Thursday, December 5, 2013 19:00 UTC

Panel

  • Dylan Northrup twitter, github, blog
  • Kris Buytaert twitter, github, blog
  • John Vincent, aka Lusis twitter, github
  • Julian Dunn twitter, github
  • Tom Robison twitter
  • Bryan Berry github, twitter, irc: bryanwb, blog: devopsanywhere
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog

Outline

See the show outline on github. Pull requests appreciated!

FOSDEM & Configuration Management Camp EU

Kris joins us to discuss FOSDEM and the Configuration Management Camp conferences. CFP for the FOSDEM Configuration Management Dev Room closes on 8 Dec and the CFP for Configuration Management Camp closes on 15 December. Submit your talks today!

Picks

Dylan

Kris

Julian

Tom

Bryan

Nathen

  • [SCaLE 12x]https://www.socallinuxexpo.org/scale12x/) - CFP is closing on 15 December.
  • #ChefConf 2014 - CFP closes in mid-January. Ticket prices go up at the end of the calendar year so lock-in the best rate now.
  • Community Cookbooks blog post

Download

  • Audio - Coming soon!
  • Video - Begins Thursday, December 5, 2013 19:00 UTC

The Food Fight Show is brought to you by Bryan Berry and Nathen Harvey with help from other hosts and the awesome community of Chefs.

The show and the newsletter are sponsored, in part, by Opscode.

Feedback, suggestions, and questions: info@foodfightshow.com or http://github.com/foodfight/showz.

entry.title: The Future of DevOps
entry.content:
Andrew Clay Shafer (@littleidea) joins us to discuss the future of DevOps.

Watch Now

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download
    • Audio
    • Video

Panel

  • Andrew Clay Shafer twitter,
  • Brandon Burton github, twitter
  • Bryan Berry github, twitter, irc: bryanwb, blog: devopsanywhere
  • Julian Dunn twitter, github
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog

Upcoming DevOps Days

  • Atlanta - October 3-4
  • Barcelona - October 10-11
  • New York - October 17-18
  • Vancouver - October 25-26
  • Portland - November 4-5
  • London - November 11-12
  • India - November 16-17

Outline

  • What is DevOps?
  • ITIL
  • Learning Organizations
  • Organizational Learning Culture's Influence on Job Satisfaction, Organizational Commitment, and Turnover Intention among R&D Professionals in Taiwan during an Economic Downturn
  • Dimensions of Organizational Learning
    • Continuous Learning
    • Inquiry and Dialogue
    • Team Learning
    • Empowerment
    • Embedded System
    • System Connection
    • Strategic Leadership
  • Questionnaire
  • Conway's Law
  • Transforming Organizations into a Learning Organizations
  • Culture
  • Continuous Learning
  • Understanding Political Processes
  • Money
  • Enterprise Transformation
  • Situational Blindness
  • The Future of these Organizations
  • Maverick
  • Local Rationality
  • Modern Management
  • Leadership
  • The Fifth Discipline
  • Make more awesome!

Picks

Andrew

  • Volunteer Work
  • Don't take things for granted

Julian

  • Leading Change by John P. Kotter
  • Winning by Jack Welsh

Nathen

  • Rocky Mountain Ruby Conference & the Introduction to Chef workshop.
  • Opscode Community Summit
  • Miah Johnson
